attributes.action: Reverse the reckless tax cuts announced by the Chancellor on the 23rd September.
attributes.additional_details: To work with the Bank of England to limit the devastating increase in interest rates and re-establish confidence in the UK’s fiscal position.
attributes.background: Reverse the proposed tax cuts aimed at generating growth at a time when the priority should be reducing inflation and controlling Government spending.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Reverse the tax cuts announced in the mini budget
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623929
